# Contributing to Online Quiz Application

Thank you for your interest in contributing to this project! Here are some guidelines to help you get started.

## How to Contribute

### Reporting Bugs
- Use the [Bug Report](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md) template
- Check existing issues first to avoid duplicates
- Provide clear steps to reproduce

### Suggesting Enhancements
- Use the [Feature Request](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md) template
- Explain the use case and benefits
- Discuss alternatives if applicable

### Pull Requests
- Follow the [Pull Request Template](pull_request_template.md)
- Keep PRs focused on a single change
- Include tests for new features
- Update documentation as needed

## Development Setup

1. Fork the repository
2. Clone your fork: `git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/Online-Quiz-Application.git`
3. Create a feature branch: `git checkout -b feature/your-feature`
4. Make your changes
5. Push to your fork
6. Open a Pull Request

## Code Standards

- Write clean, readable code
- Add comments for complex logic
- Follow Java naming conventions
- Test your changes thoroughly

## Questions?

Feel free to open an issue or discussion if you have questions!
